data.actual_result: As soon as you close the keyboard, the emojis and the mentionw won't display in bold anymore in the text field, resulting in them not being rendered after sending message
data.expected_result: Emojis and mentions should parse correctly
data.short_description: Sending a message while keyboard is closed won't parse emojis and mentions
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the emoji picker and input some emojis - Close the keyboard completely  - Send the message - You can repeat steps above but by inputting mentions instead of emojis (can be user, role or channel mentions)
